input.sentences: today is a kite day ! got the gear ready .
look at it go . like a soaring eagle .
it does n't look like much down here | but it gets some serious air .
just fixing some final kinks before my kid can take flight .
he especially enjoyed the tail . so did i really . kites are awesome .
output.sentences: Off we went to the local park to try to fly our kite.
Dad got it out and started flying it high sky.
It fell to the ground so dad fixed it.
He tried again to get it up in the air.
It started to soar again and our son was chasing the tail.
